extendedIngredients.name: broccoli rabe

title: Pasta With Garlicky Broccoli Rabe
summary: Pasta With Garlicky Broccoli Rabe might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 807 calories, 28g of protein, and 37g of fat each. For $2.02 per serving, this recipe covers 33% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1398 people were impressed by this recipe. Head to the store and pick up pasta, garlic cloves, kosher salt, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the kosher salt you could follow this main course with the Low Fat Crumbs Cake (Kosher-Dairy) as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 99%. This score is tremendous. Try Garlicky Broccoli Rabe Pasta, Butternut Squash Pasta with Spicy Garlicky Broccoli Rabe and White Beans, and Garlicky Broccoli Rabe for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.
